projects.title: Todo List
projects.description: This was my first project using React. It is an application in which you can add task lists, give them a title and mark them as done or pending

projects.title: Movies Searcher
projects.description: Movie search app that allows you to search for movies by title and view the details of the selected movie such as title, poster, release year and rating. :)

projects.title: Ecoanthophila
projects.description: Creation of e-commerce on Wordpress. Creation of content for social media. Communication with clients and suppliers.
